text: Rafet Husović (Montenegrin Cyrillic: Рафет Хусовић, 2 April 19649 March 2021) was a Montenegrin politician. He was the Deputy Prime Minister of Montenegro from 2012 until 2020. He was the founder and long-time president of the Bosniak Party (BS). Husović was born in Rožaje, SR Montenegro. Husović died on 9 March 2021, at the age of 56, after a long-illness. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Montenegrin people Category:European politicians
title: Rafet Husović
